CustomField.description: The number of seconds that have been spent talking on internal calls which have been established from one user to another within the organisation, from the perspective of the To party. Specifically this statistic only includes the transferred calls, and does not include any initial calls that the user may have received.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many seconds of talk time have I spent on calls that I received from other internal users in my organisation as a logical To party, but where the call was transferred
CustomField.label: Internal To Talk Seconds as Transferee
